title: Ticket #1457: condor_wait waits forever if an incomplete event is read
description: If condor_wait reads a partially written event, it will get stuck and wait forever. While it seems that the underlying problem is in the userLogReader API, a quick workaround for that can be to have condor_wait reinitialize the reader and re-read the whole log from scratch.
remarks:
2010-Jun-18 13:10:51 by matt:
Long term solution to this is likely related to #925

2010-Jun-18 15:44:47 by cweiss:
Yes, it is. The patch does not cure the underlying problem, but it prevents condor_wait for now from getting stuck until the actual cause is clearly identified.
